=== Topics ===

Topics with Emcaster are just strings. They can be any length are are encoded in UTF-8 for transport.

=== Topic Filtering ===

Topics are filtered using basic regular expressions. Specifically, The [http://msdn2.microsoft.com/en-us/library/system.text.regularexpressions.regex.aspx Regex]  class is used to compile and execute the expression.

=== Defining Namespaces ===
Since topics are regular expressions, take care to avoid characters commonly used in regular expressions such as asterisks and periods.
